text: Calcium oxide is a chemical compound of calcium and oxygen. Its chemical formula is CaO. It is known as quicklime. It is made in a lime kiln. It releases heat when dissolved in water and changes into calcium hydroxide. It is a white powder. It is also a base. It reacts with acids to make calcium salts. Quicklime is an important ingredient of cement. ==Related pages== *Calcium *Oxygen *Calcium hydroxide ==References== Category:Calcium compounds Category:Oxides
title: Calcium oxide
